author: wrowe
msg: Rearrange the Announcement files, add some appropriate redirects,
and mark up the apr 1.2.2 announcement

author: vgritsenko
msg: I18n: Refactored XMLResourceBundle to use transient store instead of
private cache. Added reload check interval parameter. Support dynamic
additions and removals of resource bundles, without need to restart

author: rgoers
msg: Convert CascadingRuntimeException to something more useful

author: jim

(at the root level of this project).
